code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{quickDemo}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuickDemoButton=()=>{const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleClick=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const data=await quickDemo();setResult(data.result);}catch(err){setError(err.message||'An error occurred');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Loading...':'Run Quick Demo'}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:["Error: ",error]}),result!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Result: ",result]})]});};export default QuickDemoButton;
